mapper.insert: insert into public.article (article_id, title, content, content_all, type, price, yh_type, pic, url, category, brand, rmb_price, is_discovery, mall, channel, time_sort, date) values (#{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=ARRAY,typeHandler=com.smzdm.typehandler.IntArrayHandler}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rmbPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{isDiscovery,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeSort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update public.article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_all = #{contentAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yh_type = #{yhType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=ARRAY,typeHandler=com.smzdm.typehandler.IntArrayHandler}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rmb_price = #{rmbPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, is_discovery = #{isDiscovery,jdbcType=BIT}, mall = #{mall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_sort = #{timeSort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE} where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select article_id, title, content, content_all, type, price, yh_type, pic, url, category, brand, rmb_price, is_discovery, mall, channel, time_sort, date from public.article where article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
